values.help: Set all configuration values to default values (factory settings).
values.label: Set to Default

values.help: The mode in which a different Z-Wave message is sent.
values.label: Mode

values.help: The time that a user has to activate the double button pressed scene, if time is passed then the single pressed button scene is notified. (value * 10 ms)
values.label: Double press time

values.help: A signed integer to determine the offset of the temperature.
values.label: Temperature offset
